## css2lch() function

Convert a standard CSS-compatible string to \[l, c, h\] array

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function css2lch(css: string): [number, number, number];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  css | string | the css color hex string |

<b>Returns:</b>

\[number, number, number\]
